title: Middle East Set For High Renewable Energy Capacity Growth By 2040
full_text: Middle East Set For High Renewable Energy Capacity Growth By 2040. The Middle East is on track for a high renewable energy growth rate just as the United Arab Emirates announces an eye-catching green power milestone.. An Emirati man walks beneath photovoltaic panels at al-Dhafra solar power project south of the UAE capital Abu Dhabi. (Photo: Karim Sahib) AFP via Getty Images The Middle East is on track for high … [+3570 chars]
